attributes.action: Give NHS workers a 4% pay rise
attributes.additional_details: Because they are the only institution who can make this happen!
attributes.background:
I want the government to give the NHS a 4% pay rise and instigate
immediate but reasonable tax rises for the likes of Amazon, supermarkets and other big businesses who have seen a rise in profits over the pandemic. They can afford it.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Windfall Tax Profits made by Companies during the Covid 19 Pandemic.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555131

Windfall tax on extra profits due to lockdowns to fund a bonus for NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570416

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071
